statements: DELETE FROM visas WHERE passport_number = 'AB123456' AND visa_type = 'Tourist' AND expiry_date = '2023-12-31';
DELETE FROM visa_information WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND visa_type = 'Student';
DELETE FROM passport_details WHERE nationality = 'Canada' AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM travel_documents WHERE issue_country = 'USA' AND issue_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM passport_details WHERE passport_number = 'X12345' AND issuing_country = 'USA';
